class.name: franka_teleop_lmt/CartesianPoseExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_teleop_lmt/CartesianVelocityExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_teleop_lmt/CartesianImpedanceExampleController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure and an interactive marker respectively.
